Mary G. Ward

  1. Foster Name: Mary G.
  2. Foster Family: George and Kate Cronin
  3. Location of Family: Spalding, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Columbus, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 1
  7. Date of Birth: 1911-05-01, New York City, NY
  8. Gender: female
  9. Married Name: Mary G. Graham
  10. Spouse Name: Vernon J. Graham
  11. Source: Eloise Thomsen Corres.; National Orphan Train Complex; Spalding newspaper, 16 May 1912; Grand Island Independent, 17 May 1912; 1920 United States Federal Census.
